solution_line_template: Therefore a dozen apples should cost ${tony_paid_more}

If Arnold paid ${arnold_paid} and ${cost_per_dozen_apples} for a dozen apples then the bunch of bananas cost ${arnold_paid}-${cost_per_dozen_apples}=$<<{arnold_paid}-{cost_per_dozen_apples}={cost_of_bananas}>>{cost_of_bananas}
